column5: This breathtaking condo, centrally located on Galveston Island, has everything you need for a relaxing beachfront stay.   The unit features beautiful views of the coastline and our very own swimming pool, which is heated year-round! The facilities also provide you with access to two hot tubs, a children's pool, a fitness room, a covered pavilion, and numerous BBQ grills.   Whether you are here for vacation or a weekend getaway, this unit at the Victorian will be your new home away from home!
